title: Why do the other NCT members call Lucas ‘xuxi’? - Quora

response.answer_text: Xuxi is Lucas’s birth name. Lucas actually has four names: Lucas, which is his stage name.Kwang Wook-hee 黃旭熙, which is his Korean name.Wong Yuk-hei 황욱희, which is his first birth name.Huang Xuxi, which is his second birth name.So, the other NCT members call Lucas Xuxi because that’s what his birth name is. It’s the same case with Haechan, the members sometimes call him Donghyuck, which is his birth name. Another reason could be that it just feels more normal, to call Lucas by his birth name rather than his stage name. It’s a bit weird to refer to someone by their stage name all of the time. Also, a stage name is meant to represent the person’s persona on stage, and from what I’ve noticed, when Lucas is off stage he’s cuter and more childlike, compared to his more mature and sexy demeanor on stage. So, in conclusion, these could be all of the reasons the members call Lucas Xuxi.

Lucas actually has 4 names. One being his stage name, two being his birth names, and the last is his Korean names Lucas (is correct of course, 루카스 in korean)Hwang Wook-hee 황욱희 (His Korean name)Huang Xuxi 黃旭熙 (One of his birth names)Wong Yuk-hei (His other birth name)Why do the other NCT members call Lucas ‘Xuxi’? As you can see ‘Xuxi’ is his birth name and Lucas is his stage. So maybe during trainee days he never picked his stage name and therefore introduced himself as his birth name, Xuxi or Yuk-hei. And i guess it just stuck. Key word *Maybe* Also in my opinion it’s kind of cute and suits his off stage personality well.
